backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining Product and CartItem types with persistent storage for products and user carts, providing functions to add products, retrieve products, and manage shopping cart items per principal.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features (product catalog, product detail pages, shopping cart, checkout flow, and branding) with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality in the KanhaRas Spices e-commerce application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes using warm earth tones for the spice brand aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the KanhaRas Spices application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, products, product detail, cart, checkout, and order confirmation pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying brand information, quick links, social connect section, and attribution with caffeine.ai link including UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with KanhaRas Spices logo and branding, navigation link to shop, and shopping cart button with item count badge.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper component rendering Header, main content area with Outlet for route content, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Reusable product card component displaying product image, name, description, price, availability badge, and view details button with hover effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, returning actor instance and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for product and cart operations including fetching products, managing cart items with quantity merging, and initializing seed data for spice products.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for a warm, earth-toned spice brand theme including terracotta primary colors and cream secondary colors for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart page displaying cart items with product images, quantity controls (plus/minus/delete), line totals, and checkout navigation with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout form page collecting customer contact and shipping information, validating required fields, and storing order data in sessionStorage before navigating to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Order confirmation page displaying success message with customer name, next steps checklist, and a button to continue shopping after retrieving order data from sessionStorage.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCatalog.tsx: Product catalog page component that displays a hero section with spice imagery, a search bar for filtering products, and a responsive grid of product cards with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page component that shows individual product information, image, price, availability status, quantity selector, and add-to-cart functionality with toast notifications.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes (including spice-themed colors), typography, container settings, border radius variables, and animation keyframes for the UI.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting the KanhaRas Spices e-commerce platform, including architectural notes, existing features (catalog, cart, checkout), image requirements for spice products, and pending feature requests.
